descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a poison designed to pickpocket poison and silent assassinate NPCs.[color=#ff0000]If you successfully place this poison in an NPC's inventory, no conflict will be triggered after he/she dies, unlike normal hand-crafted poisons[/color].This mod also adds a zero-damage non-hostile standalone Daedric bow and arrow.You can apply this poison to the bow and use it to poison NPCs from distance.
This poison slowly damages NPCs' health and give them a painless death.In lower levels and lower difficulties, the effect of this poison is almost immediate, while in higher levels it takes some time (almost 50 seconds to kill a Whiterun Guard with a leverl 251 Character and legendary difficulty ) to kill the target.
[color=#ff0000]The effect of this is poison is not reduced by the target's resist to poison.
[/color][color=#ffff00]Shooting with the bow or pickpocket poisoning an NPC with this poison is not a crime and it can be done right in front of the guards.[/color]
The only factor determining the time it takes to kill a target is his/her base health plus fortify health enchantments.
To add these items and the poison to your character you can type the following lines in the console:
help "daedric bow of the silent assassin"
help "daedric arrow of the silent assassin"
help "mercy of sithis"
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]I suggest you download this mod too because it increases the chance of successfully poison pickpocketing.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61977/?[/b][/size][/color]
